lead_paragraph: Zhang Shuai's transformation from an emotional wreck to a grand slam quarter-finalist has been the feel-good story of the Australian Open but also counts as a triumph of player management by her faithful coach Liu Shuo.

headline.print_headline: Coach Liu Never Lost Faith in Zhang's Fighting Spirit
headline.main: Coach Liu Never Lost Faith in Zhang's Fighting Spirit
